mapper.sql: id, ponumber, pnnumber, pn_quantity, payment, ship_to, sold_to, order_type, exchange_provision_item, condition_item, remark, carrier, customer, net_due_date, po_date, delivery_date, drop_order_time, target_date, created_by, last_modified_by
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from po
order by ${orderByClause}
SELECT po.*,flag.status FROM po,flag WHERE po.flag = flag.flag and flag.flag = 2

select iv.id as id,iv.ivnumber as ivnumber,iv.pnnumber as pnnumber, iv.pn_quantity as pnQuantity,iv.payment as payment,iv.ship_to as shipTo,iv.sold_to as soldTo, iv.order_type as orderType,iv.exchange_provision_item as exchangeProvisionItem, iv.condition_item as conditionItem,iv.remark as remark,iv.carrier as carrier, iv.customer as customer,iv.net_due_date as netDueDate,iv.po_date as poDate, iv.delivery_date as deliveryDate,iv.drop_order_time as dropOrderTime,iv.target_date as targetDate, iv.created_by as createdBy,iv.last_modified_by as lastModifiedBy,iv.flag as flag,flag.status as status from iv,flag where iv.flag = flag.flag
select po.* from po where ponumber=#{ponumber} and pnnumber = #{pnnumber}
mapper.delete: delete po.*,pn.*,mapper.* from po left join pn on (po.ponumber = pn.number) left join mapper on (po.ponumber = mapper.ponumber) where po.ponumber = #{ponumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}
delete from po where po.ponumber = #{ponumber} and po.pnnumber = #{pnnumber}
mapper.insert: insert into po (id, ponumber, pnnumber, pn_quantity, payment, ship_to, sold_to, order_type, exchange_provision_item, condition_item, remark, carrier, customer, net_due_date, po_date, delivery_date, drop_order_time, target_date, created_by, last_modified_by) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ponumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pnnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pnQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shipTo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{soldTo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{exchangeProvisionItem,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{conditionItem,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carrier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{netDueDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{poDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deliveryDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dropOrderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{targetDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModifiedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
